title: N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 21 ยง 5202.4 - Appendix A
content:
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 21 ยง 5202.4 - Appendix A
State Regulations

Reference Materials for Guidance in Staffing Standards
A-l The Math of Call Center Staffing, Penny Reynolds, ICCM
Weekly (Aug. 8, 2002). A-2 How Many Do We Really Need? A Simple Solution for

Determining Staffing, Jennifer Hagstrom, Ed. (Sept. 2000). A-3 Communications Center Staffing Formulas: Old Studies in a

New Environment, APCO Int'I. Pub. Safety Commun., APCO Bulletin, Project (40)
RETAINS, Yvonne Klees, Features Ed. (March 2001). A-4 Standard for Public Safety Communications Agencies, Commission on Accreditation for Law Enforcement Agencies. A-5 Standard for Professional Qualifications for Public

Safety Telecommunicator, National Fire Protection Agency 1061 (1996
ed.). A-6 Public Safety Answering Point (PSAP) Accreditation

Program, Program Standards Manual, New York State Sheriffs' Association. A-7 Staffing formulas as may be provided by telephone service
suppliers in the particular jurisdiction. Notes
N.Y. Comp. Codes
R. & Regs. Tit. 21
ยง
5202.4

State regulations are updated quarterly; we currently have two versions available. Below is a
comparison between our most recent version and the prior quarterly release. More comparison features will be added as we have more versions to compare. No prior version found.
